titleStmt.title: Ebb tide's and death's
a machine readable transcription

note.p: Draft lines for "Fancies at Navesink," first published in The Nineteenth Century August 1885.

bibl.author: Whitman, Walt
bibl.title: Fancies at Navesink
bibl.orgName: The Thomas B. Harned Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1842â€“1937, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.
bibl.note: Transcribed from digital images of the original.

lg.l:
Voice not to be put in
words, not for a poem,

Voices there are that
opening the gloomy darkness
—and this was of them
